title: 2022 NBA Finals Game 2 Reaction
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined on the Chase Center court by Andscape’s Marc J. Spears immediately following the Warriors’ statement victory over the Celtics to talk Golden State’s strategy change, how Boston let Draymond win the mental battle, changes in officiating after 1 technical foul and how the Celtics’ sloppy play can’t repeat in Boston. Plus, a special appearance from Warriors’ super fan Jimmy Goldstein.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Warriors Make A Statement, Draymond Wins Mental Battle With Boston
